title: How can I get 25rp
body: I want to buy  the  skin Yasuo nightbringer when they put it in the game but I only have 1795 rp and It cost 1820 I only need 25 more rp but I don't want to buy more rp again. Is there a way to get those 25rp without buying them?

replies.body: Maybe!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) or [Twitter](https://twitter.com/RiotSupport).  We'll see if we can work something out.  ;)
Porocles-senpai, I was wondering what the difference between legacy skins and retired legacy skins is. {{summoner:32}}

Sen-sen-senpai?  

https://40.media.tumblr.com/e724f6a784b814b03ecbad5aaf870d82/tumblr_mzbfy61MwR1qam6mpo4_500.jpg

Legacy skins are skins that can make a return at any time like special events, or unlocked through mystery gifts or hextech crafting.  Limited skins are extra special in that they won't make a reappearance or go on sale.  Our[ legacy skins ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752944-Guide-to-Legacy-and-Limited-Skins)guides can help too.  

http://i1238.photobucket.com/albums/ff496/Yunapalooza/004-12.jpg

If you draw a piece of art and reach out to a Rioter on the [Help & Support](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/f/osqw6G4M) Board, they might be able to fulfill your request. Be aware that it is a one time gift though, so you can't request free RP more than once.
